file.name: auth-api-1.0.0.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: BC Registries Accounts API description:

BC Registries Accounts system is used to manage the BC Registries accounts. The system manages the authorizations related data and does integration with keycloak.

version: 1.0.1 contact: name: BC Registries license: name: Apache 2.0 paths: '/users/{username}': parameters: - name: username in: path description: Corp Type required: true schema: type: string get: responses: '200': description: Success content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/user' headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers '404': description: Not Found content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: code: type: string description: Identifier representing the type of error that occurred. message: type: string description: Description of the error. description: Contains details of an error that was encountered. operationId: get_user_staff tags: - users summary: Return the user profile associated with the provided username. description: Return the user profile associated with the provided username. /users/authorizations: get: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: authorizations: type: array items: {} summary: Get the authorizations for the user operationId: get_authorization_resource tags: - users description: 'Get the authorizations for the user ' /users/@me: patch: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/contact' '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: code: type: string description: Identifier representing the type of error that occurred. message: type: string description: Description of the error. description: Contains details of an error that was encountered. operationId: patch_user tags: - users requestBody: content: application/json: schema: title: userTerms type: object properties: isTermsOfUseAccepted: type: boolean termsOfUseAcceptedVersion: type: string summary: Update terms of service for the user. description: Update terms of service for the user. delete: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers operationId: delete_user tags: - users summary: Delete the user profile. description: Delete the user profile. get: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/user' operationId: get_user tags: - users summary: Return the user profile associated with the JWT in the authorization header. description: Return the user profile associated with the JWT in the authorization header. /users: post: responses: '201': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/user' operationId: post_users tags: - users description: 'Create a new user using the request body (which will contain a JWT). If the user already exists, update the name.' summary: Create a new user get: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/user' operationId: get_users tags: - users summary: Return a set of users based on search query parameters (staff only). description: Return a set of users based on search query parameters (staff only). '/orgs/{org_id}/members/{membership_id}': parameters: - name: org_id in: path required: true schema: type: string - name: membership_id in: path required: true schema: type: string patch: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/membership' operationId: patch_org_member tags: - orgs summary: Update a membership record with new member role. description: Update a membership record with new member role. requestBody: content: application/json: schema: title: orgMembershipRequest type: object properties: role: type: string status: type: string notifyUser: type: string delete: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/membership' '404': description: Not Found content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: code: type: string description: Identifier representing the type of error that occurred. message: type: string description: Description of the error. description: Contains details of an error that was encountered. operationId: delete_org_member tags: - orgs summary: Mark a membership record as inactive. Membership must match current user token. description: Mark a membership record as inactive. Membership must match current user token. '/orgs/{org_id}/members': parameters: - name: org_id in: path required: true schema: type: string get: responses: '200': description: Success headers: X-Application-Context: schema: type: string description: X-Application-Context Access-Control-Allow-Origin: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin Access-Control-Allow-Methods: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods Access-Control-Allow-Headers: schema: type: string description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/membership' operationId: get_org_members tags: - orgs summary: Retrieve the set of members for the given org. description: Retrieve the set of members for the given org.
